--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> i forget if this scenario is public of not, if it is where do i find 
it if 
> not could u send me a copy of it?
> also when you've beatin it you would be at a comperable level to 
having 
> beaten how many of the normal scenarios?
> this would be vary helpful because i hope to start creating my 
scenario's 
> soon and i have no charecters that are the right level...

That scenario is part of my 'Torture' set, which is available for 
download at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/files/Scenarios . 
 That link gives you access to all uploaded scenarios.  Only 1 small 
thing, though.  That scenario is designed to have enough gold to bring 
characters beyond experience level 100.  I created that scenario so I 
would have a fast way of evaluating each characters where essentially 
the only weaknesses (and something else listed below) of the 
characters are the available attacks.

One side note, though.  All of the characters I have tried at 
experience level 100+ have problems using teleporters because they run 
too fast.  I believe they run at least twice as fast as their attacks.
